#include "bits/stdc++.h"
using namespace std;
long long int ans;
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long int t,n,k;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ans=1;
		cin>>n>>k;
		if(n-k<k)
			k=n-k;
		if(n>=k)
		{
			for(int j=1;j<=k;j++)
				ans=(ans*n--)/j;
				cout<<ans;
		}
		else
		cout<<0;
		cout<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
